summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Prisma v7 migration from legacy any-typed PrismaClientType shim to real PrismaClient. All critical requirements met.

minor_issues.issue: Still contains AnyObj = any type declaration on lines 9-10
minor_issues.impact: Functional but not aligned with zero-any goal
minor_issues.note: Does not cause TypeScript errors and system works correctly

passed_tests: ESLint: src/lib/db.ts passes with zero errors/warnings
yarn test: 504/504 tests pass, 35/35 files (without DATABASE_URL)
Runtime with DATABASE_URL: Returns valid PrismaClient instance
Runtime without DATABASE_URL: Returns null gracefully
Singleton behavior: Two calls to getPrisma return same instance
Schema validation: Prisma schema validates successfully
Migration SQL: File exists at correct location
action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Consider replacing AnyObj = any in storage.ts with proper Prisma types for complete any-type elimination, but current implementation is functional and meets core requirements
